# Stunning Screech (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]], [[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], Demonologist 2

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (feather of a large bird or a vrock), Drug (mushroom powder)

**Range:** 30 ft.

**Targets:** All creatures within range

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)Â­, pg. 106

The caster emits a piercing screech like that of a vrock demon. Every creature within the area is [[Stunned|stunned]] for 1 round.
